Title: Real-Time Two-Way Synchronization
Description: Notycal seamlessly syncs your Notion tasks with your Google Calendar, ensuring any updates or changes made in one platform will be reflected in the other. This keeps both your Notion and Google Calendar in perfect harmony.

Title: Customizable Sync Range
Description: With Notycal, you hold the reins. Determine the date range for which tasks should be synced to your Google Calendar. This feature allows you to focus on tasks that fall within your specified timeline, keeping your Google Calendar clutter-free.

Title: Selective Database Integration
Description: Not all tasks are created equal. Notycal allows you to choose the specific Notion databases you wish to sync to your Google Calendar. This ensures you see only the tasks that matter to you most in your calendar.

Title: Effortless Task Management
Description: Notycal enables the automatic deletion of completed tasks from your Google Calendar, providing an organized and clear view of your remaining tasks.

Title: Custom Calendar Selection
Description: Notycal gives you the option to specify the Google Calendar where you'd like your tasks included. By default, a 'Notion' calendar will be created if it doesn't exist, providing a dedicated space for your Notion tasks.

Title: Easy to Start, Easier to Master
Description: With its intuitive interface and easy setup process, Notycal integrates into your workflow with just a few clicks. It's all about making task management efficient and hassle-free.
